entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
